name: purify
flavor_text: The user heals the target’s status condition. If the move succeeds, it also restores the user’s own HP.
effect_text_extend: Cures the target of its major status ailment and heals the user for 50% of its max HP.  If the target has no major status ailment, this move will fail.
effect_text_simple: Cures the target of a major status ailment and heals the user for 50% of its max HP.
